definitions.definition: To cook food by heating in an oven or over a fire without covering , resulting in a crisp , possibly even slightly charred appearance .
examples: to roast meat on a spit

definitions.definition: To cook by surrounding with hot embers , ashes , sand , etc.
examples: to roast a potato in ashes

definitions.definition: To process by drying through exposure to sun or artificial heat .
examples: Coffee beans need roasting before use.

definitions.definition: To heat to excess ; to heat violently ; to burn .

examples: I'm late home for the fourth time this week; my mate will really roast me this time.

definitions.definition: To subject to bantering , severely criticize , sometimes as a comedy routine .
examples: He roasted a bully who then fought with him.
The class clown enjoys being roasted by mates as well as staff.

definitions.definition: To dissipate the volatile parts of by heat , as ores .
